title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Language Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental professional terminology
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve professional language proficiency (medical/legal/technical) by 20% through gamification activities
Learners apply three or more effective communication strategies while performing game-based collaborative tasks
Learners maintain and enhance language learning motivation by over 80% through weekly quizzes and mission completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
